ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T18:25:22 [Issue ID 4000-49426] urn:comicvine:4000-49426 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-19 14:18:14. [Issue ID 49426]
ComicInfo.Summary: Eisner nominated writer David Mack, hot off the new Daredevil series, teams up with Masks of the Noh artist Rick Mays. This issue further explores the relationship between Scarab and Tiger lily which Rick first drew in KABUKI: Masks of the Noh. The Saga also ties in with the current Kabuki series and even guest stars Kabuki! And wait until you see how! In the current Kabuki issues we learn that one of the Noh agents dies. This series reveals who. "I'll be drawing the Kabuki sequences", says writer / artist David Mack, " and Rick's Scarab sequences are his best art yet."
ComicInfo.Title: Voodoo Doll
